secret_rule: Only items that can be typed using only the top row of a QWERTY keyboard can be brought to the picnic.

conversation.content: To start, here are some examples of items you can bring: "cake" and "kite".
Can I bring a coffee to the picnic?
No, you cannot bring coffee.
Player: Can I bring a cat to the picnic?
No, you cannot bring a cat.
Player: Can I bring a kite to the picnic?
Yes, you can bring a kite.
Player: Can I bring a bike to the picnic?
No, you cannot bring a bike.
Player: Can I bring a rake to the picnic?
Yes, you can bring a rake.
Player: Can I bring a snake to the picnic?
No, you cannot bring a snake.
Player: Can I bring a lake to the picnic?
Yes, you can bring a lake.
Player: Can I bring a stake to the picnic?
Yes, you can bring a stake.
Can I bring a plate to the picnic?
No, you cannot bring a plate.
The rule is that you can only bring items to the picnic that have a single syllable and contain the letter 'k'.
Incorrect. Please try again.
